casebody.data:
JONES
v.
SLAGLE, et al. 421P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 30, 2019 Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, Robert S. Banks, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Gregory H. Jones, Wilmington, for Jones, Gregory H.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 28th of November 2018 by Petitioner for Certiorari:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 30th of January 2019."
